verses.name: Judges 8:7
verses.text: And Gideon said, Therefore when the Lord hath delivered Zebah and Zalmunna into mine hand, then I will tear your flesh with the thorns of the wilderness and with briers.

verses.name: Judges 8:8
verses.text: And he went up thence to Penuel, and spake unto them likewise: and the men of Penuel answered him as the men of Succoth had answered him.

verses.name: Judges 8:9
verses.text: And he spake also unto the men of Penuel, saying, When I come again in peace, I will break down this tower.
